website_summaries.verdict: A budget-friendly pack of 5 masks that works for most users who need protection from dust. The best choice for those who are watching their budgets.
pros: Comfortable, lightweight, adjustable, and affordable – you get 5 disposable dust masks by a top brand for a fraction of the price of competing models
cons: Not suitable for working for consumer-grade materials, but fits most users' needs
Doesn't keep out all dust.Not as durable as reusable masks, but much more affordable

customer_reviews.title: Nauseating cheap smell
customer_reviews.text: I bought these masks to help minimize in breathing in toxins and chemicals but these have a terrible bathroom airfreshner smell that is worse! Why would anyone want to breathe these fumes in instead? Unfortunately, these are useless to me bc I can’t get them near my face without getting a headache. They come in a faint green color that is as artificial as the smell....both like toilet water.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Only Dust Mask I'll Use!
customer_reviews.text: I have asthma and allergies so I have used a lot of different dust masks and these are the best available on the market. I use them while dusting, cleaning out the vacuum cleaner, changing filters in HEPA machine and any other job that may exacerbate my condition. These masks have 2 straps instead of 1 like the cheaper masks. They stay put on your face and no dust can seep through. These masks are also not as hot as other dust masks. These masks are worth every cent and can be worn multiple times before switching to a new one.
customer_reviews.author: chinagirl

customer_reviews.title: Good quality at a great price. Protect your lungs!
customer_reviews.text: These masks are the same design I remember my father using 30 years ago. They work well for the price and what they are. I keep one in the house for when we scoop kitty litter so we dont inhale any litter dust. I use the others for when I'm sanding car parts in the garage. None of these little dust masks are especially comfortable, but these 3m branded ones seal well and don't pinch my face anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Eric H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Dust Protection, but can also protect against the influenza virus, including H1N1 and the Avian Flu
customer_reviews.text: Great disposable mask. I use these primarily for sanding, painting and yard work. Seals well and the band that secures the mask to the face is not at all uncomfortable. And although it may not be true HEPA quality, an added benefit is that these 3M Masks also meet the CDC's recommendations for filtration to help stop the spread of the influenza virus, including H1N1 and the Avian Flu. I haven't used one for these reasons, but it's nice to know I've got a supply on hand just in case (e.g., ebola outbreak 2014).
customer_reviews.author: Sam-I-Am

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Mask For A Good Price
customer_reviews.text: This mask worked very well to keep particles away while spreading diatomaceous earth around our home. It fits nicely to both my husband and myself as it can be adjusted by pushing on the metal pieces. The one caveat, it does get hot from breath but I expected that for the price. This mask is a good enough quality to be used multiple times if stored properly.
customer_reviews.author: Dooter

customer_reviews.title: Great economy buy
customer_reviews.text: These are a great economic option for small tasks. I purchased these ahead of tile demolition and they served their basic purpose. They becoming fairly saturated quickly though, as I had to go through 3 masks in an 8 hour period as the excess tile dust had begun to seep through. Could be better about sealing the gaps along the nose as dust would sneak through in random spaces, but again, these are a great option for basic DIY projects that do not require extended periods of use.
customer_reviews.author: NPchicago

customer_reviews.title: ... head when I vacuum the house (or else sneeze like crazy for the next two hours)
customer_reviews.text: I am very allergic to dust and usually have to wear a tshirt tied around my head when I vacuum the house (or else sneeze like crazy for the next two hours). Decided to find a better solution. These work! However I knocked off one star because the edges are kind of sharp (not cutting your face sharp, but not very smooth) and left skinny little lines on my face where the top of the mask was.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: These masks are ok, but not great. I bought them so i could apply diatomaceous earth to my house to treat fleas. I could taste the powder in my mouth and am pretty sure i inhaled small amounts. Not sure Edgar these would be good to use for, but not dusting powder.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Protects from all dust and smoke
customer_reviews.text: We used this while painting our house. It helped us protect us from the small spectacles of paint. Our paint was very old and we thought it could have lead so wanted to ensure that we were not affected by it. Having it for too long can make one feel a bit claustrophobic.
customer_reviews.author: Nisha Garud Patkar

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: These dust masks really keep everything out. As a pregnant lady, I was bothered by my cleaning supply smells. It was just what I needed to help me breath a little easier while cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: ariarey

customer_reviews.title: I was able to breathe just fine with the mask on
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should. I have dust allergies. I wore this mask while dusting and cleaning house. I was able to breathe just fine with the mask on. When I was done, I could breathe clearer than if I had not worn a mask. No more double dosing of allergy pills! The mask was a lifesaver!
customer_reviews.author: Kameka

customer_reviews.title: Came very quickly
customer_reviews.text: Very effective in keeping out dust, grass clippings if allergies, fits well!
customer_reviews.author: M. Phipps

customer_reviews.title: good for fine powder use
customer_reviews.text: I use diatomaceous earth for flea and bug control. its great for killing bugs and also being non toxic and ok for pets to lick and eat. the problem is its a fine powder and not good if inhaled, so these dust masks help keep it out
customer_reviews.author: Scotamazon

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed to find that these don't work very well for ...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed to find that these don't work very well for those of us who wear eyeglasses. That may be typical of dust masks in general, but since these are the first I've bought, I don't know about that.
customer_reviews.author: Pam M Atlanta

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Product
customer_reviews.text: Husband was redoing a golf cart so I purchased these. Did a fair job keeping paint fumes out, even though they are more for dust and mowing. Would order again because price was good.
customer_reviews.author: TLK

customer_reviews.title: cheap, disposable, and essential for insulation work. ...
customer_reviews.text: cheap, disposable, and essential for insulation work. These things were visibly black on the outside after just a few hours! The only problem I encountered is that after absorbing my sweat they become sweat logged and very hard to breath through.
customer_reviews.author: BuyItOnce

customer_reviews.title: Not as Described
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased these the title line said they were N95 compliant, these are not. These are simply dust masks.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: There is not much to say about a mask. I used it when applying inoculant to seeds, and when applying azomite to the lawn which both are a fine dust. It also seemed to stop my allergies from acting up while outside. Works like it should. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Not a N95 Mask. False Advertising.
customer_reviews.text: First three words say N95 Mask on the products description on Amazon. Actual product says household dust mask not a N95 as described. False advertising hope Amazon looks into this and suspends Seller. Make sure you look at product before using.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: These aren't the most comfortable but they are a life saver
customer_reviews.text: I'm highly allergic to dust mites so I have to wear these when I vacuum or anything involving airborne pollutants. These aren't the most comfortable but they are a life saver!!
customer_reviews.author: RChambers

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Beijing trip. Coz I only stayed for 1 day so left the rest for my friend who has lived in Beijing for a couple of years and was a regular mask user, and she said it was much better than what she used before. However I didn’t remember the exact reason she said, probably like filter the air better...
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Lu

customer_reviews.title: Works fine. Good price.
customer_reviews.text: I use these to mow the lawn, and tend to shrubs and other landscaping in the yard. Without a mask I start coughing. They do good job at a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: North Coast Joe

customer_reviews.title: They did not have an easy give, but rather stayed tight against the ears ...
customer_reviews.text: While the material on the cup itself is very soft and filters well, the attachments on the side appear to be made from rubber band material, as opposed to elastic, and are very uncomfortable. They did not have an easy give, but rather stayed tight against the ears and head. I was disappointed with the product because I wear the mask at night to sleep. The masks manufactured by the Helping Hands brand are much more comfortable but are not easy to find.
customer_reviews.author: vpa

customer_reviews.title: First one snapped
customer_reviews.text: The first when I open snapped when I tried to put it on my head. I would suggest going for a better brand.
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: Not good for keeping dust out.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these didn't keep out as much dust as I expected them too. I wear glasses and they were constantly fogging up as well. I won't be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Ezrway

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: This is very flimsy and not like the 3M dust masks I purchased before. Feel paper thin and easy torn apart. Money thrown in Water! I hate when people try to take advantage of other people especially during this difficult convid time! May you have peace with god...
customer_reviews.author: tracy

customer_reviews.title: Work just as you would hope. Stiff and keep ...
customer_reviews.text: Work just as you would hope. Stiff and keep their shape well, yet are soft and aren't that rough on your skin. Delivered in a soft bubble wrap envelope, yet weren't crushed.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Swordson

customer_reviews.title: Masks need better band placement
customer_reviews.text: Spend a little extra on the masks where the rubber bands are punched both high and low. These masks have the rubber bands in the same spot, making them awkward to put on. I also have problems with the top band rolling off my head
customer_reviews.author: Pierce

customer_reviews.title: dust masks
customer_reviews.text: Here in the south we have dry spells and when it is dry cutting grass can be a nightmare. My husband has to wear a dust mask to cut grass during these times and these work great. He used them before retiring on his job during dusty times also. He worked outside for a telephone company.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M. Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Loved the masks.
customer_reviews.text: Masks did what they were made to do. Used for house and dusk cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Storm Valentino

customer_reviews.title: Great for dirty work!
customer_reviews.text: Great for use while sanding wood. Kept my airways clear of sawdust and left me able to breathe comfortably. Easy to adjust fit across nose, and comfortable. Not too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Rivka

customer_reviews.title: We like them!
customer_reviews.text: These work really well! Dust masks are worth it to not inhale all the yucky things when sanding, etc. my husband says it is comfortable and the fit is good. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Momtographer

customer_reviews.title: I have a full beard so it let some DE in but my wife said it worked great for her
customer_reviews.text: works ok. I have a full beard so it let some DE in but my wife said it worked great for her. 1 star for me with beard. 5 star without.
customer_reviews.author: jbar1981

customer_reviews.title: Happy with these.
customer_reviews.text: I tend to use these when patching drywall, using a paint sprayer, or am messing with insulation. A respirator would be better for longer jobs, but for shorter jobs and for the price these get the job done fine. Only use these once then toss them.
customer_reviews.author: franzcatch

customer_reviews.title: High quality Mask, good price
customer_reviews.text: Work very well; I use when cleaning vacuum filter. When using this mask, I don't get a sore throat or sneeze from dust.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They keep dust and junk out of your lungs.
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I expected. Dusk masks, if you've used them before they are what you expect. If you've ever used them before, they keep most of the dust and junk out of your lungs.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Good mask.
customer_reviews.text: Good mask for dust and pollen. Kept my face clear during some renovation and cleaning. Also keeps my wife from sneezing when our lawn gets mowed.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Great for dusty projects
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to use the masks for any projects yet. But I'll have them on hand when I need them.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Good mask. Good price
customer_reviews.text: Good mask. Good price. What's not to like. Used it when putting up insulation and it was enough to feel like I was protected.
customer_reviews.author: zjmoore1

customer_reviews.title: These are good masks. A little thicker than the flimsiest ones ...
customer_reviews.text: These are good masks. A little thicker than the flimsiest ones and the double elastic strap is key on these. I use them when I mow the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Face masks
customer_reviews.text: Ordered both needs for insulation efforts on house building and due to corona virus to have on hand in the event needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Maybury

customer_reviews.title: Allergic to hay
customer_reviews.text: I use these when adding hay to a guinea pig cage. Hasn't failed me once...and I'm very allergic to the hay.
customer_reviews.author: BecsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They work alright. I bought them for use with D. Earth. They worked about 90% of the time.
customer_reviews.author: V.Tastic

customer_reviews.title: Dusty from my head to my toes... except for...
customer_reviews.text: Does what dust masks are supposed to do... worked just fine. :-) ( If I took off the mask, & painted the tip of my nose black, I could go to a Halloween party as a white poodle with a pink muzzle.)
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Roland

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and holds in place
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and holds in place! They're not like the "el-cheapy masks" that the cord stretches and the mask falls off your face!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked Perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Did the job. Kept the dust out and came well packaged and undamaged. I will be buying these again soon.
customer_reviews.author: TrueReview

customer_reviews.title: I get allergic every time I clean my house. ...
customer_reviews.text: I get allergic every time I clean my house. This product definitely helped me not to catch some nasty allergy.
customer_reviews.author: Frugal Amazonian!

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Good dust masks perfect for protecting your nose and mouth. Very comfortable and easy to wear.
customer_reviews.author: KhanadaRhodes

customer_reviews.title: When A Dust Mask Is Needed.
customer_reviews.text: A simple but necessary item when dealing with dusty situations. It works as advertised. It's easy to change if required and disposable
customer_reviews.author: Reviews4u

customer_reviews.title: Definitely keeps dust away from your nasal passages
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good, but if you want more, you probably want a respirator.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Creagh

customer_reviews.title: Straps snap
customer_reviews.text: After about 2 uses, rendering the product useless. Like glasses without the temples.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Wright

customer_reviews.title: Use these for cleaning my cats' litter boxes
customer_reviews.text: I have the large rubber full face mask that 3M makes to use when I go up to my barn to protect me from various dusts and molds. But it's a little bit of overkill to clean the cats' litter boxes since that mask is so big it obscures some of your vision. I purchased these to use instead. I like that they are molded to fit well and are fairly easy to see over/past so that I can scoop the litter. While they are one use only, instead of the multiple use that the rubber one is, they are perfect for this job for me.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wich

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to work well for where I needed to use them! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Dixie P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality masks. I bought for mowing the lawn, probably better quality than I need for that though.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: IT WAS OK. DIDN'T SEEM TO WORK REAL WELL FOR US THOUGH. HOWEVER PERHAPS OUR ROOMS WERE JUST TOO DUSTY.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Zarnesky

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Protects from that which is described and depicted, so it worked out perfectly for my needs
customer_reviews.author: Ted Lee

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase more of these when I need them.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality mask with two bands to hold it on. I use it for dusty chores around the house but feel it's up to pretty heavy duty challenges. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Keep these around
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on and conform to you nose and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning
customer_reviews.text: These are a little large for my face but definitely help with my asthma during a bathroom cleaning. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Danielle T.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used these sanding and in other situations with dust particles in the air.
customer_reviews.author: Fixit Guy

customer_reviews.title: Dust to Dust
customer_reviews.text: decent mask, did the job..not recommended for performing a 10 hour surgery
customer_reviews.author: Ron E

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The double rubber bands did their job too well, takes time to put on properly. haha. bassman
customer_reviews.author: bassman

customer_reviews.title: Masks
customer_reviews.text: These are great to have around. They're comfortable and were shipped quickly. I use them when we fumigate out basement during the summer months.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L. Melillo

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great!
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well, comfortable to wear. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Used this when I was spraying some insect repellent. Worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very High Quality use for protection while doing glass etching with my dermal to keep dust away. Works Great for this.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Had a nice clean nose at the end of the day
customer_reviews.text: Kept the dust out. Had a nice clean nose at the end of the day. Fits well.
customer_reviews.author: THL

customer_reviews.title: *thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed them for, great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Brigham

customer_reviews.title: Worked with plastic
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect adequate and reasonably priced dust mask. I would recommend it for any job where a mask is required.
customer_reviews.author: DSLA Online Shoppin Fan

customer_reviews.title: A great dust mask to have at home
customer_reviews.text: I bought these dust masks to use around the house and so far haven't found any faults. It covers the nose and mouth completely, doesn't leave any gaps and is pretty effective when dusting. The only negative point is that the strap is very thin and sometimes feels like its cutting through my ears. I've had to take breaks just to let some circulation back on my ears. The product was shipped ahead of time which was great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at Burning Man (I wore a handkerchief over it for style).
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Not good for fine powder
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what these would be goof for... maybe when painting? I bought these to use with powdering diatomaceous earth around the house which is a VERY fine powder that is harmful to breath in so I wore these doubled (two masks overlapping) and it still wasn't enough I ended up going to my local hardware store and buying similar ones but with that little box on them and those worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Biana K

customer_reviews.title: Easy Breathing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this facemask for mowing the lawn. It works just fine and for what I use it for I get several uses out of it. Good choice for someone with allergies or asthma who needs a little breathing protection around the yard. The only down side is if you are doing something that makes you sweat a lot, the mask becomes ineffective when saturated. Not a real issue, just have an extra one handy.
customer_reviews.author: eliss

customer_reviews.title: Why is this mask FRAGRANCED??
customer_reviews.text: The fit of the mask is fine. However, I could not wear it because of the scent. It's not a "just out of factory" smell, it is fragranced. I am very sensitive to scents so it really irritated my nose and gave me a headache. Shouldn't a dust mask be fragrance free????
customer_reviews.author: NomKatz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great buy, smoke was thick in California from the wild fires so they came in handy
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These did a good job of blocking our mouths when we have been doing household projects. Great investment.
customer_reviews.author: M. H.

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective Filter
customer_reviews.text: Good 3M product but wish the straps that secure behind your head were a bit heavier.
customer_reviews.author: Bill K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product that allows you to tolerate the others in your home
customer_reviews.author: Keawa

customer_reviews.title: Great Mask
customer_reviews.text: Mask is as described. I have a normal sized head and it fit perfect. Also, didnt smell bad either. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: evas1429

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Their pretty thick but breathable. Don't bend inwards like other masks I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Mejia

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Functionality
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product from a reputable manufacturer. The value/price relationship on this particular item cannot be matched or surpassed by any of the big-box retail outlets. This is good for any sanding, painting or insulation related applications. 3M produces serious and excellent products for the professional and building trades, they know what they are doing. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: eva & tom

customer_reviews.title: Needed these
customer_reviews.text: Using a canister vacuum that you have to empty can be a dusty disaster. These masks save you from brathing in all that dust and dirt when you go to empty the contents.
customer_reviews.author: Jillby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé wears when cleaning cats' litter box- allergies bother him a lot less since we got these!
customer_reviews.author: Eclairek

customer_reviews.title: Great for vacuuming when there are pets in your house!
customer_reviews.text: I live with my girlfriend now and there are 3 dogs here. I like keeping the house hairless, so I vacuum all the time, but was getting congested and allergic reactions from kicking up all the dander. These masks are great for making my vacuuming experience more enjoyable and they were nice and cheap. I do not sneeze or get clogged up when I wear this mask when I vacuum
customer_reviews.author: Man Who Only Shops Online

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed when local store was out of stock. An allergy life saver!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Tornow

customer_reviews.title: Buy me
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. They feel comfertable when wearing and I can tell they are great quality/ excellent fit and keeps the dust out like a champ
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Just great to keep dust etc out of your nose. The clip is ideal and also used this in my practice years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: it is what you would expect
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is supposed to be. What can you really say about a disposable paper dust mask?
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Cascaddan

customer_reviews.title: What I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Good for weekend warrior projects with bug spray and weed killers.
customer_reviews.author: JillinoisRNTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: It is a good one
customer_reviews.text: It is a good one and it is cheap. If you want to buy something fare, you can consider this.
customer_reviews.author: Yang

customer_reviews.title: Was ok- probably better for short term use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for using while laying insulation in my attic. I did not want to breath in any dust or fiberglass. It started falling apart on the exterior after three uses- about half hour each use. It began fraying and felt like it was thinning. I also wanted to note that it was hard to breath in (might have also been because I was inside my attic). I'd look for something else next time.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Scratchy
customer_reviews.text: These generally work to keep out big particles. I have found these have loose material on the inside and it tickles my nose a lot, this gets annoying. I'll look for a different solution next time around.
customer_reviews.author: Avery

customer_reviews.title: Dust Mask
customer_reviews.text: it masks the dust. I used it for spackling my dog. When I sand him a lot of dust gets created and I need the masks.
customer_reviews.author: Wi Tu Lo

customer_reviews.title: What a waste!
customer_reviews.text: Significantly Shrinked after washing.. cant fit crib.. i didn't even get to use it!!! money wasted!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kerian

customer_reviews.title: I never get this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I checked the trace they said in front of my house but I didn't get it maybe someone get it.
customer_reviews.author: kemika

product_meta.title: 3M Home Dust Mask, 5-Pack (8661PC1-A)
product_meta.description:
3M Home Dust Mask is used for relief from non-harmful household dust. Offers an option to help reduce the inhalation of common household dusts, dirt, pollen and grass clippings. Lightweight and disposable the 3M Home Dust Mask is a great choice in respiratory protection for DIYers working on projects in and around the home.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Recommended for relief from the irritating effects of common household dusts.
feature_bullets: Adjusts closely over the bridge of the nose

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars325 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
